\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Dispossessed
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A visionary anarchist utopia on a moon. Physics, politics, and philosophy braided into fiction.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: This Changes Everything
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Naomi Klein
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A spicy, accurate critique of capitalism as the root of climate collapse. Her books should come with matches.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Wretched of the Earth
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Frantz Fanon
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Colonialism, decolonization, trauma, and revolution. It still hits like a brick thrown through history.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Pedagogy of the Oppressed
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Paulo Freire
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: The foundation for radical education. Liberation through dialogue, not top-down instruction.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: An Ordinary Person’s Guide to Empire
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Arundhati Roy
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Essays from the front lines of global capitalism and resistance. Sharp, poetic, devastating.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Braiding Sweetgrass
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Robin Wall Kimmerer
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Botany, Indigenous wisdom, and poetic activism braided into one of the most beautiful books ever written.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Last Summer of Reason
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Tahar Djaout
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A haunting fable about soft authoritarianism and censorship. For people who still believe books matter.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Doppelganger
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Naomi Klein
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A genre-bending mirror maze through misinformation, radicalization, and stolen identity.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Are Prisons Obsolete?
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Angela Davis
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Concise and crystal clear. Prison abolition 101 by the legend herself.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Emergent Strategy
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: adrienne maree brown
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A literal spellbook for organizing. Nature, change, science fiction, and softness as political power.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Anarchist Cookbook
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Author Withheld
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: (For educational purposes only.) A glimpse into radical self-publishing and surveillance-state panic.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: Ethics of Ambiguity
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Simone de Beauvoir
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Existentialist ethics for revolutionaries and wanderers who reject fixed roles.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Anti-Capitalist Resistance Cookbook
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Yet unwritten
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: A dream. A prompt. A community artifact in progress.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: The Art of War
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: Sun Tzu, annotated by queer organizers
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Ancient strategy with new annotations for soft power, survival, and subversion.

\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.title: A Hacker Manifesto
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.author: McKenzie Wark
\ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Core Frameworks.blurb: Code meets class warfare. Theory, technology, and cultural remix in poetic form.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: How to Do Nothing
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Jenny Odell
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: The manifesto of reclaiming time, meaning, and place in a world that wants to monetize your every blink.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: Mutual Aid
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Dean Spade
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: A practical and philosophical guide to building networks of care and resistance.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: Hope in the Dark
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Rebecca Solnit
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: Gentle, powerful reminders that resistance works, even when we can’t see it yet.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: Caliban and the Witch
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Silvia Federici
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: Capitalism, patriarchy, and witch hunts. A foundational text for rethinking power and bodies.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: Quit Like A Woman
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Holly Whitaker
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: Sobriety as feminist rebellion. Capitalism’s grip on our coping mechanisms exposed.

\u2728 Soft Addenda.title: Copaganda
\u2728 Soft Addenda.author: Alec Karakatsanis
\u2728 Soft Addenda.blurb: The media myths that protect policing—and what we can do about it. Fast, brutal, clear.
